articles.description: Virat Kohli won several hearts with his reaction to RCB... RCB... chants by fans in the stadium during the India vs Australia 2nd Test in New Delhi.
articles.content: A true great of Indian cricket, Virat Kohli isn't someone who leads the scoring charts for the team on the field but also a personality who inspires millions off it. Kohli's ethics, grit, determinati… [+1878 chars]

articles.title: Writing on the wall for K L Rahul? - Deccan Herald
articles.description: The Indian team’s media manager was on edge during Rohit Sharma’s press conference on Sunday. He was being coerced by another member of their backroom staff to wrap up the post-match press conference. Everyone was suddenly very aware of the time: 3:30 pm.
